hero.title: Cleanroom Certification and Performance Testing Services
hero.description:
At Star Filters, we provide NEBB-certified cleanroom performance testing to ensure every controlled area operates in full compliance with ISO 14644 and GMP standards, including NOM-059-SSA1-2015, NOM-241-SSA1-2021, NOM-249-SSA1-2010, and Federal Standard 209E.

Our goal is to verify that your cleanroom systems perform with maximum efficiency, safety, and air purity â€” protecting your process and product integrity.

hepaIntegrity.title: HEPA Filter Leak Test
hepaIntegrity.description: Verifies that HEPA filters are free from leaks and maintain an effective barrier against airborne particles, ensuring product and process protection.

particleCount.title: Airborne Particle Count Test
particleCount.description: Determines the ISO cleanliness classification of your cleanroom by measuring airborne particle size and concentration to confirm compliance with process requirements.

ductLeakage.title: Air Leakage Test
ductLeakage.description: Checks that air handling systems and ductwork are properly sealed, preventing energy loss and maintaining stable cleanroom pressure levels.

airBalancing.title: Air and Pressure Balancing
airBalancing.description: Measures and adjusts airflow, air changes per hour, and pressure differentials between rooms to prevent cross-contamination and ensure optimal system performance.
